00036 ostream* os_ = 0;

00038 
00039 void testAccept(const string& filename)
00040 {
00041     if (os_) *os_ << "testAccept(): " << filename << endl;
00042 
00043     ifstream is(filename.c_str());
00044     if (!is)
00045         throw runtime_error(("Unable to open file: " + filename).c_str());
00046 
00047     string head(512, '\0');
00048     is.read(&head[0], (std::streamsize)head.size());
00049     is.close();
00050 
00051     Reader_RAW reader;
00052     bool accepted = reader.accept(filename, head);
00053     if (os_) *os_ << "accepted: " << boolalpha << accepted << endl;
00054 
00055     #ifdef _MSC_VER
00056     unit_assert(accepted);
00057     #else // _MSC_VER
00058     unit_assert(!accepted);
00059     #endif // _MSC_VER
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void testRead(const string& filename)
00064 {
00065     if (os_) *os_ << "testRead(): " << filename << endl;
00066 
00067     // read RAW file into MSData object
00068 
00069     Reader_RAW reader;
00070     MSData msd;
00071     reader.read(filename, msd);
00072 
00073     // make assertions about msd
00074 
00075     //if (os_) TextWriter(*os_,0)(msd); 
00076 
00077     unit_assert(msd.run.spectrumListPtr.get());
00078     SpectrumList& sl = *msd.run.spectrumListPtr;
00079     if (os_) *os_ << "spectrum list size: " << sl.size() << endl;
00080     unit_assert(sl.size() == 48);
00081 
00082     SpectrumPtr spectrum = sl.spectrum(0, true);
00083     if (os_) TextWriter(*os_,0)(*spectrum); 
00084     unit_assert(spectrum->index == 0);
00085     unit_assert(spectrum->id == "1"); // scan number
00086     unit_assert(spectrum->nativeID == "1"); // scan number
00087     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(0).index == 0);
00088     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(0).id == "1");
00089     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(0).nativeID == "1");
00090     int scanEvent = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_preset_scan_configuration).valueAs<int>();
00091     unit_assert(scanEvent == 1);
00092     unit_assert(spectrum->cvParam(MS_ms_level).valueAs<int>() == 1); 
00093     CVParam massAnalyzer = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type);
00094     unit_assert(massAnalyzer.cvid == MS_FT_ICR);
00095     vector<MZIntensityPair> data;
00096     spectrum->getMZIntensityPairs(data);
00097     unit_assert(data.size() == 19914);
00098 
00099     spectrum = sl.spectrum(1, true);
00100     if (os_) TextWriter(*os_,0)(*spectrum); 
00101     unit_assert(spectrum->index == 1);
00102     unit_assert(spectrum->id == "2"); // scan number
00103     unit_assert(spectrum->nativeID == "2"); // scan number
00104     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(1).index == 1);
00105     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(1).id == "2");
00106     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(1).nativeID == "2");
00107     scanEvent = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_preset_scan_configuration).valueAs<int>();
00108     unit_assert(scanEvent == 2);
00109     unit_assert(spectrum->cvParam(MS_ms_level).valueAs<int>() == 1); 
00110     massAnalyzer = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type);
00111     unit_assert(massAnalyzer.cvid == MS_ion_trap);
00112     spectrum->getMZIntensityPairs(data);
00113     unit_assert(data.size() == 19800);
00114 
00115     spectrum = sl.spectrum(2, true);
00116     if (os_) TextWriter(*os_,0)(*spectrum); 
00117     unit_assert(spectrum->index == 2);
00118     unit_assert(spectrum->id == "3"); // scan number
00119     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(2).index == 2);
00120     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(2).id == "3");
00121     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(2).nativeID == "3");
00122     scanEvent = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_preset_scan_configuration).valueAs<int>();
00123     unit_assert(scanEvent == 3);
00124     unit_assert(spectrum->cvParam(MS_ms_level).valueAs<int>() == 2); 
00125     massAnalyzer = spectrum->spectrumDescription.scan.cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type);
00126     unit_assert(massAnalyzer.cvid == MS_ion_trap);
00127     spectrum->getMZIntensityPairs(data);
00128     unit_assert(data.size() == 485);
00129     unit_assert(spectrum->spectrumDescription.precursors.size() == 1);
00130     const Precursor& precursor = spectrum->spectrumDescription.precursors[0];
00131     unit_assert(precursor.spectrumID == "2"); // previous ms1 scan
00132     unit_assert_equal(precursor.ionSelection.cvParam(MS_m_z).valueAs<double>(), 810.79, 1e-15);
00133     unit_assert_equal(precursor.ionSelection.cvParam(MS_intensity).valueAs<double>(), 0, 1e-15);
00134 
00135     spectrum = sl.spectrum(5, true);
00136     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(5).index == 5);
00137     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(5).id == "6");
00138     unit_assert(sl.spectrumIdentity(5).nativeID == "6");
00139     unit_assert(spectrum->spectrumDescription.precursors.size() == 1);
00140     const Precursor& precursor2 = spectrum->spectrumDescription.precursors[0];
00141     unit_assert(precursor2.spectrumID == "2"); // previous ms1 scan
00142 
00143     // test file-level metadata 
00144 
00145     unit_assert(msd.fileDescription.fileContent.hasCVParam(MS_MSn_spectrum));
00146 }

00149 void test(const string& filename)
00150 {
00151     testAccept(filename);
00152     
00153     #ifdef _MSC_VER
00154     testRead(filename);
00155     #else
00156     if (os_) *os_ << "Not MSVC -- nothing to do.\n";
00157     #endif // _MSC_VER
00158 }

00160 
00161 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00162 {
00163     try
00164     {
00165         vector<string> filenames;
00166 
00167         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++)
00168         {
00169             if (!strcmp(argv[i],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00170             else filenames.push_back(argv[i]);
00171         }
00172 
00173         if (filenames.size()!=1)
00174             throw runtime_error("Usage: Reader_RAW_Test [-v] filename"); 
00175             
00176         test(filenames[0]);
00177         return 0;
00178     }
00179     catch (exception& e)
00180     {
00181         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00182     }
00183     catch (...)
00184     {
00185         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00186     }
00187     
00188     return 1;
00189 }
